summary: An ordinance amending Section 7, as heretofore amended, and Section 16, each of Ordinance No. 45382, said ordinance being entitled: "An ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries; regulating and limiting the use of buildings and premises and the height and size of buildings; providing for yards, courts, or other open spaces; establishing districts for the said purposes; defining offenses; prescribing penalties and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith", approved June 28, 1923, and adding thereto two (2) new sections to be known respectively as Section 2-Y and Section 17-Z.
